events.name: EV battery supply chain expansion
events.wd_description: The growing demand for electric vehicles drives a significant increase in the demand for battery raw materials, requiring technological advancements and new investments to meet net-zero emissions targets.
events.description: The growing demand for electric vehicles drives a significant increase in the demand for battery raw materials, requiring technological advancements and new investments to meet net-zero emissions targets.

events.name: Demand increase for raw materials
events.wd_description: The electric vehicle market demand for lithium, cobalt, nickel, and graphite is projected to increase significantly by 2050.
events.description: The electric vehicle market demand for lithium, cobalt, nickel, and graphite is projected to increase significantly by 2050.

events.name: Lithium demand
events.wd_description: The demand for lithium is expected to increase 26 times between 2021 and 2050 to meet net-zero emissions targets.
events.description: The demand for lithium is expected to increase 26 times between 2021 and 2050 to meet net-zero emissions targets.

events.name: Cobalt demand
events.wd_description: The demand for cobalt is expected to increase 6 times between 2021 and 2050 to meet net-zero emissions targets.
events.description: The demand for cobalt is expected to increase 6 times between 2021 and 2050 to meet net-zero emissions targets.

events.name: Nickel demand
events.wd_description: The demand for nickel is expected to increase 12 times between 2021 and 2050 to meet net-zero emissions targets.
events.description: The demand for nickel is expected to increase 12 times between 2021 and 2050 to meet net-zero emissions targets.

events.name: Graphite demand
events.wd_description: The demand for graphite is expected to increase 9 times between 2021 and 2050 to meet net-zero emissions targets.
events.description: The demand for graphite is expected to increase 9 times between 2021 and 2050 to meet net-zero emissions targets.

events.name: Challenges in meeting demand
events.wd_description: Diverse challenges in meeting the growing demand for battery minerals include sustainable supply uncertainties, environmental, social, and governance complexities, and geopolitical tensions.
events.description: Diverse challenges in meeting the growing demand for battery minerals include sustainable supply uncertainties, environmental, social, and governance complexities, and geopolitical tensions.

events.name: Sustainable supply uncertainties
events.wd_description: Uncertainties in sustainably supplying the necessary battery minerals to meet future demand.
events.description: Uncertainties in sustainably supplying the necessary battery minerals to meet future demand.

events.name: Environmental complexities
events.wd_description: Environmental challenges associated with extracting and processing battery minerals.
events.description: Environmental challenges associated with extracting and processing battery minerals.

events.name: Social and governance complexities
events.wd_description: Social and governance issues related to mining and processing battery minerals, including labor practices and community impacts.
events.description: Social and governance issues related to mining and processing battery minerals, including labor practices and community impacts.

events.name: Geopolitical tensions
events.wd_description: Geopolitical issues affecting the stability and reliability of the battery mineral supply chain.
events.description: Geopolitical issues affecting the stability and reliability of the battery mineral supply chain.

events.name: Stakeholder approaches
events.wd_description: Evaluation of the approaches adopted by regulatory agencies, governments, mining companies, vehicle and battery manufacturers, and other stakeholders in the battery value chain.
events.description: Evaluation of the approaches adopted by regulatory agencies, governments, mining companies, vehicle and battery manufacturers, and other stakeholders in the battery value chain.

events.name: Regulatory agencies
events.wd_description: Approaches adopted by regulatory agencies to address the challenges in the battery value chain.
events.description: Approaches adopted by regulatory agencies to address the challenges in the battery value chain.

events.name: Governments
events.wd_description: Governmental strategies to support the growth and sustainability of the battery value chain.
events.description: Governmental strategies to support the growth and sustainability of the battery value chain.

events.name: Mining companies
events.wd_description: Approaches taken by mining companies to ensure a sustainable and reliable supply of battery minerals.
events.description: Approaches taken by mining companies to ensure a sustainable and reliable supply of battery minerals.

events.name: Vehicle manufacturers
events.wd_description: Strategies employed by vehicle manufacturers to integrate sustainable battery technologies into their products.
events.description: Strategies employed by vehicle manufacturers to integrate sustainable battery technologies into their products.

events.name: Battery manufacturers
events.wd_description: Efforts by battery manufacturers to optimize production and ensure the sustainability of battery supplies.
events.description: Efforts by battery manufacturers to optimize production and ensure the sustainability of battery supplies.
